dashboardDefaults.calendarLegalText: This calendar is not a complete list of your obligations as a business.
dashboardDefaults.calendarTooltip: This calendar shows you NJ filing due dates unique to your business. Click on any item to learn where to file.

onboardingDefaults.dateOfFormationErrorText: Your formation date must be in the past, and should be formatted as MM/YYYY.
